content.rendered:
We understand that as a student trying to balance school, work, family and friends you need a simple free checking that fits banking into your busy schedule.  Our student checking offers services that allow you to take your banking on-the-go!

 

Opening your first checking account is the first step to becoming more independent and managing your new checking account is a big responsibility. So we want to teach you how to manage it successfully! The most important part of managing your account is to make sure you don’t spend more money than you have available in your account.
